text: TRANSACTION COMMIT Write record to log. All log records up to txn's record are flushed to disk. » Note that log flushes are sequential, synchronous writes to disk > Many log records per log page When the commit succeeds, write a special record to log. _— » This does not need to be flushed immediately.
